name: Dracovish
description: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
abilities.description: The Pokémon’s strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during a sandstorm, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in a sandstorm.
